QuadPlot, original

Source: R/QuadPlot.R
QuadPlot.Rd

QuadPlot, original

QuadPlot(
  dframe = NULL,
  X = NA,
  Y = NA,
  Name = NA,
  PERIOD = 5,
  d1.col = NULL,
  d2.col = NULL,
  rng = NULL,
  Title = NA,
  plot.type = 1,
  style = 1,
  flip.colors = NULL,
  bg.polys = FALSE,
  Xlab = NULL,
  Ylab = NULL,
  Label = NULL,
  Symbol = c(21, 21, 21, 21, 21, 24, 24, 24, 24, 24, 25, 25, 25, 25, 25),
  bg.color = c("black", "white", "grey", "red", "blue"),
  ol.color = "black",
  Xlim = NA,
  Ylim = NA,
  AxisCex = 0.9,
  LabelCex = 0.9,
  XYLabCex = 0.9,
  LegendCex = 0.8,
  LegendPointCex = 1,
  TitleCex = 1,
  TextCex = 0.8,
  PointCex = 1,
  Period.Label = "Years",
  Bmar = NA,
  Lmar = NA,
  Tmar = NA,
  Rmar = NA,
  AltTxt = NA,
  l.inset = c(0, 0),
  TextOffset = 0.5,
  PlotLegend = NULL
)
